name: Hotel Mirabell

reviews.title: Hospitality, cleanliness and professionality in this family run hotel..

reviews.text: Perfect location for access to railway station and in general to the means of transportation.
reviews.title: excellent value for the money

reviews.text: The room (such as the whole hotel) was very clean, modern and spacious even if I booked a Single room (the only spot was that there wasn't air conditioning)
reviews.title: Really Good Value for Money

reviews.text: My husband, almost 2yr old son and myself stayed here for one night before flying back to the US. Nice, clean, nothing extravegant. Very friendly and helpful staff. Would highly recommend staying here. Close walk to trainstation. Rate was 87 euros for us. Bargain when considering location and yummy breakfast.
reviews.title: family friendly

likes.liked: — Friendly staff and good value. Non-smoking rooms!!

reviews.text: This hotel is very convenient - a 5 minute walk from the train station. The rooms were simple, but the price made it a bargain. The staff was very friendly and everyone spoke English. My luggage was lost and they offered to help in any way they could. I definitely felt comfortable and welcome here.
reviews.title: Friendly Staff and Convenient Location

likes.liked: — Friendly Staff - close to train station
likes.disliked: — The rooms were a bit on the small side

reviews.title: Wonderful hotel for families
reviews.text: We booked the family room for 4 and felt that the hotel exceeded our expectations. The hotel staff was extremely child friendly, giving candy to them every evening. There were 2 bedrooms and a small sitting room with TV. The breakfast was excellent with a variety of meats, cheeses, fresh fruits,and breads. The coffee and hot chocolate were excellent as well. The superior service was definitely what made the hotel so memorable for us. We asked the staff to help us plan a day trip into the Bavarian Alps. They helped us narrow down our choices, provided us with great advice, and even copied train and cable car schedules for us. We chose to go up to the highest peak in Germany and had a fantastic time. The hotel's close proximity to the main train station made it a great vantage point for exploring Munich and it's surrounding areas. We would definitely stay here again.

reviews.title: relaying phone messages
reviews.text: My son was traveling with his school and he hadn't called home, I phoned 4/16 and left a message at the desk as well as on 4/17 for him to please phone home. He never got the message. I feel in my opinion that was very poor customer service.

reviews.title: Okay, but some problems
reviews.text: we checked in at 15:00 and we were given a room that was not prepared.then we were transfered to another that was twin and not double as that we booked.then we were adviced to wait until the mentioned room was ready...finaly we were given this room.

description: Centrally located, modern ambience and good value –these are the main features of our family-run bed & breakfast hotel.We are located in close proximity to the central station with direct access to Munich Airport and the trade fair center 'Neue Messe Riem'. The hotel in the city center of Munich is the ideal starting point for any kind of leisure or business activity. Experience the distinctive flair of the Bavarian capital between Bavaria, Frauenkirche, Marienplatz and Viktualienmarkt.
